headline3: Wananijwe n'ibisubizo bya ERP bihuje bose?
subheading1: Igisubizo cya ERP gihinduranyije rimwe rihuje n'ibyo ukeneye.
erpImportant: Guhindura ERP ni ingenzi ku kigo cyawe, ariko ntibisobanuye ko ugomba gukoresha ibisubizo bya ERP bihenze cyane no kwishyura amafaranga y'impushya buri gihe cyangwa ugahitamo ibisubizo bya ERP bihendutse.
howToGet: Utegura ute igisubizo cya ERP gihendutse kandi cyahinduwe kuri wowe?
codeSubtext: Ni byiza niba uri inzobere kandi ufite bike byo gukora. Ariko niba wuzuye akazi... ibi si ibyawe.
hireSubtext: Gushaka abakozi beza ntibyoroshye. Gutoza no kwinjiza abakozi birahenze. Ndetse nubwo wabona umukozi mwiza... uracyishingikiriza kuri uwo muntu!
hireAbroadSubtext: Ibibazo by'itumanaho, gutandukana kw'amasaha, no kubura kumenya iby'aho byashobora gutuma hatabaho kubahiriza igihe cyagenwe n'ibyo witeze. Ndetse amafaranga wazigamye ashobora kugabanuka bitewe n'izi mbogamizi.
localSubtext: Ntabwo turi ahantu hatazwi. Turi sosiyete y'ino aha, uzashobora kutugeraho igihe cyose ukeneye.
specializedSubtext: Buri wese afite icyo ashoboye... nta wuhanga ibintu byose. Kwibanda ku byo dushoboye bituma twizera ibyo dukora. Niyo mpamvu dukorana nâ€™inganda tuzi, kugira ngo twemeze ibyavuyemo.
contactUsHeading: Twandikire kugirango tuganire ku buntu ku ihinduranywa rya ERP
noObligations: Nta gahato, nta mikorere y'ubucuruzi ikuza ibintu. Ntituzatwara umwanya wawe ubusa.
name: Izina
importantQuestion: Ni iki kibazo cyawe cy'ingenzi kurusha ibindi?
